paper.title: Calculating with pointer structures
paper.venue: Proceedings of the IFIP TC 2 WG 2.1 international workshop on Algorithmic languages and calculi
paper.abstract: Based on the algebra of relations and maps we present some techniques for safe manipulation of pointer structures, with a special emphasis on tree-like structures. We investigate sufficient criteria for preservation of substructures under selective updating. The approach is illustrated with some simple examples.
